childElements.name: TextBlock4
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12.0, "label" : "TextBlock4", "text" : "

Thank you for your interest in applying for a Grant.

\n

By submitting your Letter of Intent (LOI), you are expressing an interest in receiving grant funds for a project. Once your LOI is reviewed, we will make a determination as to whether or not you are eligible to apply and send you an invitation to do so.

\n

You may attach supporting documentation, such as a project plan, company overview, or other documentation as part of your LOI submission.

\n

", "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }

childElements.name: TextBlock5
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12.0, "label" : "TextBlock5", "text" : "

Thank you for your submission. Please check your email for a confirmation - if you have not recieved and email in the next 24 hours, please call our help desk so we may ensure we have the correct email address on file.

\n

We will reach out via email if you have been selected to move on in the process.

", "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }
